pkgmetadata.longdescription: htmldom parses the HTML file and provides methods for iterating and searching and modifying the parse tree in a similar way as Jquery.The source code of the library can be found at `htmldom<https://github.com/bhimsen92/htmldom>`_.To report bugs, you can open ticket at `HTMLDOM Bug Tracker<http://sourceforge.net/p/thehtmldom/tickets/>`_.You can find examples at `Examples<https://sourceforge.net/p/thehtmldom/thehtmldom/thehtmldom/thread/ca6c4227/>`_.For documentation click on this link: `Documentation<http://thehtmldom.sourceforge.net/>`_.
